addPoints(uint256,uint256).details: Only the rankedBattle contract address can call this function.

params.points: The number of points to be added to the fighter.
params.tokenId: The ID of the fighter token.

adjustAdminAccess(address,bool).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.access: Whether the address has admin access or not.

claimRewards(string[],string[],uint256[2.details: The user can only claim rewards once for each round.

params.customAttributes: Array with [element, weight] of the newly created fighter.
params.modelTypes: The array of model types corresponding to each round and winner address.
params.modelURIs: The array of model URIs corresponding to each round and winner address.

params.maxId: The maximum token ID up to which the points will be retrieved.

returns._0: An array of points corresponding to the fighters' token IDs.
numRewards The amount of unclaimed fighters.

pickWinner(uint256[]).details: Only admins are authorized to call this function.The number of winners must match the expected number of winners per period.The function will check that there are no existing winners for the current round.The function will update the winnerAddresses mapping with the addresses of the winners.The function will also reset the fighterPoints of the winners to zero.

params.winners: The array of token IDs representing the winners.

transferOwnership(address).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.newOwnerAddress: The address of the new owner

updateWinnersPerPeriod(uint256).details: Only admins are authorized to call this function.

params.newWinnersPerPeriodAmount: The new number of winners per period.

addPoints(uint256,uint256).notice: Add merging pool points to a fighter.

adjustAdminAccess(address,bool).notice: Adjusts admin access for a user.

claimRewards(string[],string[],uint256[2.notice: Allows the user to batch claim rewards for multiple rounds.

constructor.notice: Sets the address for the owner, ranked battle, and fighter farm contracts. Instantiates the fighter farm contract and sets the owner to be an admin

fighterPoints(uint256).notice: Mapping of fighterId to fighter points.

getFighterPoints(uint256).notice: Retrieves the points for multiple fighters up to the specified maximum token ID.

getUnclaimedRewards(address).notice: Gets the unclaimed rewards for a specific address.

isAdmin(address).notice: Mapping of address to admin status.

isSelectionComplete(uint256).notice: Mapping of round id to an indication of whether winners have been selected yet.

numRoundsClaimed(address).notice: Maps the user address to the number of rounds they've claimed for

pickWinner(uint256[]).notice: Allows the admin to pick the winners for the current round.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership from one address to another.

updateWinnersPerPeriod(uint256).notice: Change the number of winners per competition period.

winnerAddresses(uint256,uint256).notice: Mapping of roundId to winner addresses list.

documentation.text: @notice Event emitted when merging pool points are added.
@notice Event emitted when claimed.
@notice Number of winners per period.
@notice Current roundId.
@notice Total points.
@notice The address that deploys the smart contract.
@notice The address of the ranked battle contract.
@notice The fighter farm contract instance.
@notice Maps the user address to the number of rounds they've claimed for
@notice Mapping of fighterId to fighter points.
@notice Mapping of roundId to winner addresses list.
@notice Mapping of round id to an indication of whether winners have been selected yet.
@notice Mapping of address to admin status.
